thread.title: Joyce welcomes signing of OECD Science and Innovation Declaration in Korea (New Zealand Government)
thread.title_full: Joyce welcomes signing of OECD Science and Innovation Declaration in Korea (New Zealand Government) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Joyce welcomes signing of OECD Science and Innovation Declaration in Korea (New Zealand Government)
text: ( Source : New Zealand Government ) Science and Innovation Minister Steven Joyce has welcomed the signing of the ' Daejeon Declaration on Science, Technology and Innovation Policies for the Global and Digital Age ' at the OECD Ministers Meeting
